overview:
Jeffrey is the Founder and CEO at CraveLabs. He has been an entrepreneur and worked exclusively in software technology startup companies since before graduating from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst with a degree in Computer Systems Engineering. He founded CraveLabs with a belief that it was finally time for mobile and social media technology to have a truly positive impact on the local businesses in the world around us.

Prior to CraveLabs, Jeffrey was a co-founder and CTO for Newbury Networks, Inc., an Idealab! Boston incubated company that built indoor wireless location tracking systems and applications for enterprise networks. He was received patents for inventions in the areas of core location tracking algorithms and wireless network security while at Newbury. Newbury was acquired by Trapeze Networks, at the time a division of Belden, Inc., in 2008.

Before co-founding Newbury, Jeffrey was recruited straight out of college by Virtual-Ink Corporation to work on advanced realtime online collaboration technologies, based on his undergraduate research project at UMass that had received NSF grants in 1999 and 2000.
